001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.function.Function;
008import java.util.function.Supplier;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.Builder;
011
012//@FunctionalInterface
013public class UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> {
014    List<TAction> actions = new ArrayList<>();
015    Supplier<TActionBuilder> actionBuilder;
016
017    public UpdateActionBuilder(Supplier<TActionBuilder> actionBuilder) {
018        this.actionBuilder = actionBuilder;
019    }
020
021    public static <TAction, TActionBuilder> UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> of(
022            Supplier<TActionBuilder> actionBuilder) {
023        return new UpdateActionBuilder<>(actionBuilder);
024    }
025
026    public UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> plus(TAction action) {
027        actions.add(action);
028
029        return this;
030    }
031
032    public UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> plus(Collection<TAction> action) {
033        actions.addAll(action);
034
035        return this;
036    }
037
038    public UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> plus(Builder<? extends TAction> action) {
039        actions.add(action.build());
040
041        return this;
042    }
043
044    public UpdateActionBuilder<TAction, TActionBuilder> plus(
045            Function<TActionBuilder, Builder<? extends TAction>> updateFn) {
046        actions.add(updateFn.apply(actionBuilder.get()).build());
047
048        return this;
049    }
050}
